title: Passengers’ revenge on drunken grub
text:
What are these? Arrest ... This man was restrained with seatbelts and tape on Siberia Airlines flight after abusing passengers. Source: Supplied 
PASSENGERS were forced to use sticky tape and seatbelts to restrain a boozed-up passenger who took air rage to new heights. 
The dramatic incident was captured on mobile phone on a Siberia Airlines flight from Hong Kong to Vladivostok. 
Russian media reports the allegedly drunk man was abusive to fellow travellers and airline staff before passengers took matters into their own hands. Drunk passenger on Siberia Airlines 
The clip shows the man being thrown to the floor before a number of flyers appear to punch and kick him in an attempt to control the situation. 
The video has been viewed close to 700,000 times since being uploaded. 
“The kind of thing that only happens on a Russian flight,” one YouTube user wrote.
